user_initial_prompt: build a backend for online bakery shop
tech_stack_summary: Web Development → Backend → REST → Java → Spring Boot → Jetty

Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.rationale: The chosen option, Web Development, is suitable for building a backend for an online bakery shop as it provides a platform to create and maintain digital assets that are network-accessible, making it possible to build the necessary features for an e-commerce website.
Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.purpose: Enables creation of a dynamic and interactive web application with user-friendly interfaces for users to browse products, place orders, manage accounts, and more.

Web Development -> Backend.rationale: The user requirement is to build a backend for an online bakery shop, which involves managing data and server operations.
Web Development -> Backend.purpose: This option enables the development of the necessary serverside logic and database management for the online bakery application.

Backend -> REST.rationale: REST is widely used and understood in the web development community, making it easier for developers to work on and maintain.
Backend -> REST.purpose: REST enables the creation of stateless API endpoints to handle requests and responses between the backend and frontend.

REST -> Java.rationale: Java is a versatile, robust, and scalable language with a rich ecosystem of libraries for building web applications and APIs.
REST -> Java.purpose: enables development of the backend for the online bakery shop

Java -> Spring Boot.rationale: Popularity, extensive community support and rich ecosystem make Spring Boot an excellent choice for building the backend for an online bakery shop.
Java -> Spring Boot.purpose: Enables rapid development of production-ready spring-based applications

Spring Boot -> Jetty.rationale: Jetty is lightweight and easy to integrate with Spring Boot, providing a simple and efficient solution for running our application.
Spring Boot -> Jetty.purpose: Enables deployment of the online bakery shop backend application.
